name: Atelier~ The Visual Novel
description:
Hi there! Soooo about Atelier~ the visual novel

It's a story about a student who does traditional art only, one day they are given an opportunity to try digital art because of the free licences of Cyber Creator Suite that their school acquired. 

Will they choose to try to create something digitally? 

Or decide on finishing a painting they were working on the day before?

The choice is yours!

If you choose to install the creative software called CyberAtelier, you will be able to meet their personification, talk with other creative softwares and create some art together.

The game features:

A bunch of art-creating gameplay 

  • Choices made by you will affect how the created artwork will look like,
  • In a way, it's a custom drawing timelapse-making experience,
  • 3 Endings
  • 1 Hour of gameplay (If going for all the endings)

The characters of the softwares are inspired by Adobe Creative Suite.

What might be coming in the future:

  • Polish translation
  • Bug fixes (if any will be found)

If you downloaded the game - Thank You! 

I hope you enjoyed my game, if you have any feedback, notes or stuff leave a comment!
